H0.text: Who was the Principal Conductor of the Halle Orchestra from 1943 to 1970. Malcolm Sargent

H1.text: Who was the Principal Conductor of the Halle Orchestra from 1943 to 1970. Adrian Boult

H2.text: Who was the Principal Conductor of the Halle Orchestra from 1943 to 1970. Thomas Beecham

H3.text: Who was the Principal Conductor of the Halle Orchestra from 1943 to 1970. Barbirolli

A4.text: Over the next 27 years, from 1943 to 1970, the orchestra's next music director, Sir John Barbirolli, restored the Hall√© to national prominence.

A5.text: During his tenure, the orchestra gave the first performance of the Symphony No. 1 of Sir Edward Elgar.
